DEMO_417_MSG_010: ̃Here it is... now, let's hurry and blow this thing to smithereens!
DEMO_417_MSG_020: ̃This should do the trick. I know it's small, but the explosion, along with the machine's energy, should cause a chain re-... !
DEMO_417_MSG_030: ́Not so fast! Stop right there, you Resistance maggots!
DEMO_417_MSG_040: ̃Well, now... look who decided to stroll in! What took you so long, Itaburu?
DEMO_417_MSG_050:
́Hmm, Lucia... ! What are you doing in my fortress!? 
And Anses, you too... what is going on!?
DEMO_417_MSG_060: ̃Oh-hoh-hoh! Your lousy security in this place... what a joke! It was as easy as taking candy from a baby...
DEMO_417_MSG_070:
́Quiet, you rats! You dirty little scoundrels! Rats shouldn't be roaming outside of their cages!
ā
DEMO_417_MSG_080: ́As such, I cannot let you do as you please! I'll end this here, before HE arrives!
